resources.string:
Welcome to Scavenger Hunt, the aim of the game is for each player to scavenge as many items as possible to build their collection.

 Grownups must read the item on their screen each round then players must dash to find the item, the first player back adds it to their collection the player with the most items after 10 rounds is crowned the winner. Tap the timer icon for an extra challenge.

 Good luck scavengers!!!
You\'re half way there \nnow can you find..
